title: Misty
brief_description: Two young children living with their grandparents see a wild horse and they become enchanted. Like a dream, this horse runs with the wind and belongs to the wild. Obsessed with the thought of owning the horse, the children battle against all odds. When their dream comes true the horse will show them an adventure of love and freedom they had never thought possible.
